Module com.example.dmscoursework
Package com.example.dmscoursework.View.Board

Class GameBoard

java.lang.Object
com.example.dmscoursework.View.Board.GameBoard
public class GameBoard extends Object
The GameBoard class makes the game board on which the game is played. It draws the relevant features such as the Ball, Paddle, Wall as well the text on the game board.
Since:
04-01-2022
Version:
1.0
Author:
William Michiel Simson van Dijkhuizen

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GameBoard(StartController startController)
    Constructs a game board using the information passed to it from the startController such as the theme, the username of the player and the stage that the gameBoard needs to be placed on.
